EmailTemplate.name: 16.ComColl.SessionBC.none.D.G.E.2426.Email 7 - Insight Article
EmailTemplate.subject: A cloud-native vision for Nokia SBCs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Migrating SBCs to the Cloud A cloud-native vision for SBC
From our perspective, there are three key elements CSPs require if they are to achieve their virtualization, cloud, and network-evolution goals. Being able to meet these requirements is at the core of Nokia’s product technology strategy.
The new Nokia Session Border Controller (SBC) for cloud is a prime example of what that strategy looks like in action. Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Communications and Collaboration Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © 2017 Nokia.
